staxel.village.dialogue.RemVillage.line:: Oh! I...I didn't expect to see you here...
Uh... How did you even get here? Those devices are one time use and rather hard to make...
It was that ^c:1486b0;scientist^c:pop;, wasn't it?
I just wanted to bring ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop; back, you know?
We all wanted that, but he just wouldn't come...kept talking about duty in his letters...
It was really hard to build something that could transfer objects from place to place!
It was one-time-use too...
How did she even fix it?
Well never mind. You're here now.
At least one of you came willingly...
I'm here to bring ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop; back.
Oh...
I shouldn't really help you, but...
It's hard to see him so distressed.
Perhaps it was truly wrong of me to drag him back. Maybe he'll come back of his own free will someday...
Alright. I'll help you. It won't be easy though...
We didn't want him to run away so we moved him somewhere...special...for the time being.
If you could get me a few items I should be able to pull together something that will whisk you past the barrier.
There should be ^c:d03e37;five components^c:pop;. If you look around the ^c:1486b0;tree houses^c:pop; here you should find them.
We shouldn't be seen talking until you find the ^c:d03e37;five components^c:pop;.
It would be bad if they suspected something was happening...
Yes, this looks like everything we need!
Now if you just give me a minu-
I apologise, the device initiated before I was quite ready.
I hope I didn't cause you too much unnecessary concern...?
Who are you? Are you here to sell us something?
Just so you know, we don't have much money here...
Too much being spent on personal projects and maintenence you see...
Oh! You know ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop;?
Well... I can send you back. But I don't think I have enough parts to visit myself...
Do you want to go?
Yep!
No. I wanna look around.
Oh! I...I didn't expect to see you here...
Uh... How did you even get here?
Did your ^c:1486b0;scientist^c:pop; give that device to you?
I was sure they would give it to ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop;...
Can you go back and tell them to work on it so more?
Sure!
Nope.
How are you still here? Did something fail?
These teleporters sure are finicky aren't they...
Do you want me to try and send you back again?
Yep!
No. I wanna look around.
Alright then. See you again soon.
Are you sure?
Well... come back to me when you want to leave then.
Huh... how did that not work?
Give me a moment to see if I can get it working.
